content:
The provided code chunk is part of a larger application involving 3D rendering and user interface creation. The document appears to be implementing a 3D scene viewing system with layered display regions, cameras, and associated UI controls. The specific chunk pertains to creating a draw page for configuring curve rendering styles, which sits within the broader context of setting up a windowing system for visualizing 3D content.

## DRAW PAGE ##
        drawFrame = tk.Frame(self.drawPage, relief = tk.SUNKEN,
                             borderwidth = 2)

        self.sf = Pmw.ScrolledFrame(self.drawPage, horizflex = 'elastic')
        self.sf.pack(fill = 'both', expand = 1)
        sfFrame = self.sf.interior()

        label = tk.Label(sfFrame, text = 'CURVE RENDERING STYLE',
                         font=('MSSansSerif', 12, 'bold'))
        label.pack(fill = tk.X)
